Automotive Logistics.Heading: Automotive Logistics
Automotive Logistics.Desc: We provide a special, dependable logistics solution to our automotive clients, which is one of our main competences.

Offer services.Heading: We handle the whole range of logistics-related transportation tasks, including:

Points.First: Car Transportation on Trailers (We offer land transportation of automobiles to Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Bahrain, Qatar, Oman, Jordan, Egypt, etc. A Multi-Car Carrier Trailer has a capacity of up to eight cars.Container transportation from & to all UAE ports.
Points.Second: Local distribution of spare parts and allied products through pickups with customs clearance.
Points.Forth: Single vehicles can also be carried on single vehicle carriers known as Recovery trucks as per customer specifications (Air and Ocean).
